scripts.build: better-npm-run build:common && better-npm-run build:es5 && better-npm-run build:es6
scripts.docs: react-app-rewired build --scripts-version react-scripts-ts && rm -rf ./docs && mv build ./docs && cp ./src/CNAME ./docs/CNAME && cp ./src/404.html ./docs/404.html  && git add -A
scripts.dist-module: better-npm-run build:common && better-npm-run build:es5 && better-npm-run build:es6
scripts.publish:patch: cd dist && npm version patch && cd .. && node ./scripts/syncVersion.js && npm run docs
scripts.publish:minor: cd dist && npm version minor && cd .. && node ./scripts/syncVersion.js && npm run docs

betterScripts.build:es5: rm -rf ./dist/commonjs && tsc src/react-multi-email/*.tsx --declaration --outDir dist/commonjs --jsx react --module commonjs --target es5 --downlevelIteration --moduleResolution node
betterScripts.build:es6: rm -rf ./dist/es6 && tsc src/react-multi-email/*.tsx --declaration --outDir dist/es6 --jsx react --module es6 --target es6 --moduleResolution node
